00023 #include <Interpolation_IBM_elem_fluid.h>
00024 #include <Param.h>
00025 #include <DoubleTab.h>
00026 #include <DoubleTrav.h>
00027 #include <Array_base.h>
00028 #include <Domaine.h>
00029 #include <IntTab.h>
00030 
00031 Implemente_instanciable( Interpolation_IBM_elem_fluid, "Interpolation_IBM_element_fluide|IBM_element_fluide", Interpolation_IBM_base ) ;
00032 // XD interpolation_ibm_elem_fluid interpolation_ibm_base ibm_element_fluide 1 Immersed Boundary Method (IBM): fluid element interpolation.
00033 
00034 Sortie& Interpolation_IBM_elem_fluid::printOn( Sortie& os ) const
00035 {
00036   Interpolation_IBM_base::printOn( os );
00037   return os;
00038 }
00039 
00040 void Interpolation_IBM_elem_fluid::set_param(Param& param)
00041 {
00042   param.ajouter("points_fluides",&fluid_points_lu_,Param::REQUIRED); //!< XD_ADD_P field_base Node field giving the projection of the point below (points_solides) falling into the pure cell fluid
00043   param.ajouter("points_solides",&solid_points_lu_,Param::REQUIRED); //!< XD_ADD_P field_base Node field giving the projection of the node on the immersed boundary
00044   param.ajouter("elements_fluides",&fluid_elems_lu_,Param::REQUIRED);   //!< XD_ADD_P field_base Node field giving the number of the element (cell) containing the pure fluid point
00045   param.ajouter("correspondance_elements",&corresp_elems_lu_,Param::REQUIRED);   //!< XD_ADD_P field_base Cell field giving the SALOME cell number
00046 }
00047 
00048 Entree& Interpolation_IBM_elem_fluid::readOn( Entree& is )
00049 {
00050   Param param(que_suis_je());
00051   set_param(param);
00052   param.lire_avec_accolades_depuis(is);
00053   return is;
00054 }
00055 
00056 void Interpolation_IBM_elem_fluid::discretise(const Discretisation_base& dis, Zone_dis_base& la_zone_EF)
00057 {
00058   int nb_comp = Objet_U::dimension;
00059   Noms units(nb_comp);
00060   Noms c_nam(nb_comp);
00061 
00062   dis.discretiser_champ("champ_sommets",la_zone_EF,"fluid_elems","none",1,0., fluid_elems_);
00063   fluid_elems_.valeur().affecter(fluid_elems_lu_);
00064   if ((&corresp_elems_lu_)->non_nul())
00065     {
00066       dis.discretiser_champ("champ_elem",la_zone_EF,"corresp_elems","none",1,0., corresp_elems_);
00067       corresp_elems_.valeur().affecter(corresp_elems_lu_);
00068     }
00069   dis.discretiser_champ("vitesse",la_zone_EF,vectoriel,c_nam,units,nb_comp,0.,fluid_points_);
00070   fluid_points_.valeur().affecter(fluid_points_lu_);
00071   dis.discretiser_champ("vitesse",la_zone_EF,vectoriel,c_nam,units,nb_comp,0.,solid_points_);
00072   solid_points_.valeur().affecter(solid_points_lu_);
00073   computeFluidElems(la_zone_EF);
00074 }
00075 
00076 void Interpolation_IBM_elem_fluid::computeFluidElems(Zone_dis_base& la_zone_EF)
00077 {
00078   double eps = 1e-12;
00079   int nb_som = la_zone_EF.nb_som();
00080   int nb_som_tot = la_zone_EF.nb_som_tot();
00081   int nb_elem = la_zone_EF.nb_elem();
00082   int nb_elem_tot = la_zone_EF.nb_elem_tot();
00083   const DoubleTab& coordsDom = la_zone_EF.zone().domaine().coord_sommets();
00084 // const IntTab& elems = la_zone_EF.zone().les_elems();
00085 
00086   DoubleTab& elems_fluid_ref = fluid_elems_.valeur().valeurs();
00087   DoubleTab& fluid_points_ref = fluid_points_.valeur().valeurs();
00088   DoubleTab& solid_points_ref = solid_points_.valeur().valeurs();
00089 
00090 // La numerotation des elements peut avoir changee entre l'etape pre_pro et
00091 // l'etape calcul (cas du pre_pro Salome)
00092 // On utilise un champ d'etiquette pour fluid_elems_ (par exemple le no elem Salome)
00093 // et un champ d'element reprenant ces etiquettes
00094   if ((&corresp_elems_)->non_nul())
00095     {
00096       DoubleTab& corresp_elems_ref = corresp_elems_.valeur().valeurs();
00097       int nb_tag_max = -1;
00098       for (int i = 0 ; i < nb_elem_tot ; i++)
00099         {
00100           int int_cor_elem = lrint(corresp_elems_ref(i));
00101           if (int_cor_elem > nb_tag_max) nb_tag_max = int_cor_elem;
00102         }
00103       int dimtag = nb_tag_max+1;
00104       DoubleTrav elems_fluid_trust(dimtag);
00105       elems_fluid_trust = -1.e+10;
00106       for (int i = 0 ; i < nb_elem_tot ; i++)
00107         {
00108           int indextag = lrint(corresp_elems_ref(i)) ;
00109 // Cerr << indextag << ", " << dimtag << ", " << nb_elem << ", " << nb_elem_tot << ", " << nb_som << ", " << nb_som_tot << finl;
00110 // abort();
00111           if (indextag < dimtag && indextag >= 0)
00112             {
00113               elems_fluid_trust(indextag) = i*1.0;
00114             }
00115           else
00116             {
00117               Cerr<<"erreur in computeFluidElems : elem corresp_elems_ref(elem) = "<<i<<" "<<corresp_elems_ref(i)<<" ; indextag = "<<indextag<<" < 0 ou >= "<<dimtag<<finl;
00118               exit();
00119             }
00120         }
00121       for (int i = 0 ; i < nb_som ; i++)
00122         {
00123           if (elems_fluid_ref(i) >= 0.0)
00124             {
00125               int indexr = lrint(elems_fluid_ref(i));
00126               if (indexr < dimtag && indexr >= 0)
00127                 {
00128                   if (elems_fluid_trust(indexr) >= 0.)
00129                     {
00130                       elems_fluid_ref(i) = elems_fluid_trust(indexr);
00131                     }
00132                   else
00133                     {
00134                       double x = fluid_points_ref(i,0);
00135                       double y = fluid_points_ref(i,1);
00136                       double z = fluid_points_ref(i,2);
00137                       double xs = solid_points_ref(i,0);
00138                       double ys = solid_points_ref(i,1);
00139                       double zs = solid_points_ref(i,2);
00140                       double d = (x-xs)*(x-xs)+(y-ys)*(y-ys)+(z-zs)*(z-zs);
00141                       if (d < eps)
00142 // A ne pas considerer si points fluide et solide sont confondus (erreur prepro)
00143                         {
00144                           elems_fluid_ref(i) = elems_fluid_trust(indexr);
00145                         }
00146                       else
00147                         {
00148                           Cerr << __FILE__ << (int)__LINE__ << "Interpolation_IBM_elem_fluid::computeFluidElems : ERROR : joint width too low?" << finl;
00149                           Cerr<<"node elems_fluid_ref(node) index = "<<i<<" "<<elems_fluid_ref(i)<<" "<<indexr<<finl;
00150                           Cerr<<"elems_fluid_trust(index) < 0. = "<<elems_fluid_trust(indexr)<<finl;
00151                           Cerr<<"nb som som_tot elem elem_tot = "<<nb_som<<" "<<nb_som_tot<<" "<<nb_elem<<" "<<nb_elem_tot<<finl;
00152                           Cerr<<"coords_point(node) : x y z    = "<<coordsDom(i,0)<<" "<<coordsDom(i,1)<<" "<<coordsDom(i,2)<<finl;
00153                           Cerr<<"fluid_points(node) : xf yf zf = "<<x<<" "<<y<<" "<<z<<finl;
00154                           Cerr<<"solid_points(node) : xs ys zs = "<<xs<<" "<<ys<<" "<<zs<<finl;
00155                           int elem_found = la_zone_EF.zone().chercher_elements(x,y,z);
00156                           Cerr<<"chercher_elements(xf,yf,zf) = "<<elem_found<<finl;
00157                           exit();
00158                         }
00159                     }
00160                 }
00161               else
00162                 {
00163                   Cerr << __FILE__ << (int)__LINE__ << "Interpolation_IBM_elem_fluid::computeFluidElems : ERROR : joint width too low?" << finl;
00164                   Cerr<<"node elems_fluid_ref(node) = "<<i<<" "<<elems_fluid_ref(i)<<finl;
00165                   Cerr<<"index = "<<indexr<<" < 0 ou >= "<<dimtag<<finl;
00166                   exit();
00167                 }
00168             }
00169         }
00170     }
00171 }
